Title: Look at oneself from the principle of "One divides into two", always wield power well for the revolution
Designer: Hebei renmin chubanshe design group (河北人民出版社创作组)
Publisher: Hebei renmin chubanshe (河北人民出版社)
Notes: The Mao quotation on the wall is from Quotations from Mao Zedong, chapter 17, Serving the people: "We should be modest and prudent, guard against arrogance and rashness, and serve the Chinese people heart and soul" ("China's Two Possible Destinies" [23 April 1945], Selected Works, Vol. III, 253).
Theme: Mao Zedong ThoughtQuotations from Chairman Mao
